title: Bug 121170 - get_column_label from meta data object should return user recognizable strings
OB: When calling IMetaData.getColumnLabel() before extracting data, the returned labels are null. However, after extracting the data, the labels are recognizable strings.
EB: The method IMetaData.getColumnLabel() should always return recognizable strings, regardless of whether the data has been extracted or not.
SR: To reproduce the issue, call the method IMetaData.getColumnLabel() before and after extracting data and compare the results.
